title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples to score the response.

The first point can be earned with either ∫ 0 3 ( f ( x )−g ( x ) )  dx MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaWdXaqaamaabmaabaGaam OzaiaayIW7daqadaqaaiaadIhaaiaawIcacaGLPaaacqGHsislcaWG NbGaaGjcVpaabmaabaGaamiEaaGaayjkaiaawMcaaaGaayjkaiaawM caaiaaykW7caaMc8UaamizaiaadIhaaSqaaiaaicdaaeaacaaIZaaa niabgUIiYdaaaa@484B@ or ∫ 0 3 f ( x )  dx MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaWdXaqaaiaadAgacaaMi8 +aaeWaaeaacaWG4baacaGLOaGaayzkaaGaaGPaVlaaykW7caWGKbGa amiEaaWcbaGaaGimaaqaaiaaiodaa0Gaey4kIipaaaa@40D2@ .

The second point is earned for evidence of 3.24125 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaaIZaGaaiOlaiaaikdaca aI0aGaaGymaiaaikdacaaI1aaaaa@3853@ being used as an area, which means it is being subtracted outside of an integrand. For example, ∫ 0 3 f ( x )  dx −3.24125 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaWdXgqabaGaamOzaiaayI W7daqadaqaaiaadIhaaiaawIcacaGLPaaacaaMc8UaaGPaVlaadsga caWG4baaleaacaaIWaaabaGaaG4maaqdcaGLRicakiabgkHiTiaaio dacaGGUaGaaGOmaiaaisdacaaIXaGaaGOmaiaaiwdaaaa@4684@ would earn the point, while ∫ 0 3 f ( x ) −3.24125 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaWdXgqabaGaamOzaiaayI W7daqadaqaaiaadIhaaiaawIcacaGLPaaaaSqaaiaaicdaaeaacaaI ZaaaniaawUIiaOGaeyOeI0IaaG4maiaac6cacaaIYaGaaGinaiaaig dacaaIYaGaaGynaaaa@4188@ would provide evidence for earning this point only in the presence of the final answer of 4.920  (or 4.919). MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaaI0aGaaiOlaiaaiMdaca aIYaGaaGimaiaaykW7caqGGaGaaeikaiaab+gacaqGYbGaaeiiaiaa isdacaGGUaGaaGyoaiaaigdacaaI5aGaaeykaiaac6caaaa@414F@

Note that responses in degree mode, which lead to a final answer of approximately 10.756727, MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaaIXaGaaGimaiaac6caca aI3aGaaGynaiaaiAdacaaI3aGaaGOmaiaaiEdacaGGSaaaaa@3A89@ do not earn the first point for which they are eligible. Thus a fully correct solution in degree mode would earn two of the three points.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

The first point is earned for an integrand of the form ( f ( x )−k ) 2 − ( g ( x )−k ) 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaqadaqaaiaadAgacaaMi8 +aaeWaaeaacaWG4baacaGLOaGaayzkaaGaeyOeI0Iaam4AaaGaayjk aiaawMcaamaaCaaaleqabaGaaGOmaaaakiabgkHiTmaabmaabaGaam 4zaiaayIW7daqadaqaaiaadIhaaiaawIcacaGLPaaacqGHsislcaWG RbaacaGLOaGaayzkaaWaaWbaaSqabeaacaaIYaaaaaaa@46CE@ where k=−3,  0, MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGRbGaeyypa0JaeyOeI0 IaaG4maiaacYcacaaMc8UaaGPaVlaaicdacaGGSaaaaa@3C04@ or 3. MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaaIZaGaaiOlaaaa@34A3@

The second point can be earned if f MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGMbaaaa@341F@ and g MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGNbaaaa@3420@ are reversed.

The third point is earned for replacing ∫ 0 3 g ( x )  dx MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaWdXaqaaiaadEgacaaMi8 +aaeWaaeaacaWG4baacaGLOaGaayzkaaGaaGPaVlaaykW7caWGKbGa amiEaaWcbaGaaGimaaqaaiaaiodaa0Gaey4kIipaaaa@40D3@ with 3.24135 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaaIZaGaaiOlaiaaikdaca aI0aGaaGymaiaaiodacaaI1aaaaa@3854@ and ∫ 0 3 ( g ( x ) )   2  dx MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaWdXaqaamaabmaabaGaam 4zaiaayIW7daqadaqaaiaadIhaaiaawIcacaGLPaaaaiaawIcacaGL PaaacaaMc8+aaWbaaSqabeaacaaIYaaaaOGaaGPaVlaadsgacaWG4b aaleaacaaIWaaabaGaaG4maaqdcqGHRiI8aaaa@434F@ with 5.32021. MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaaI1aGaaiOlaiaaiodaca aIYaGaaGimaiaaikdacaaIXaGaaiOlaaaa@3901@ There are multiple ways that a response can use these values correctly, so the third point can also be earned with sufficient work in the presence of the correct final value of 156.263709. MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaaIXaGaaGynaiaaiAdaca GGUaGaaGOmaiaaiAdacaaIZaGaaG4naiaaicdacaaI5aGaaiOlaaaa @3B49@

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

The first point is earned with an integrand of the form ( f ( x )−g ( x ) ) 2 .
